## updateLocationIfNeeded() function

If the provided search intents include a 'NEAR\_ME' intent and there's no existing user's location in state, retrieve and store user's location in headless state.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function updateLocationIfNeeded(answersActions: AnswersActions, intents: SearchIntent[], geolocationOptions?: PositionOptions): Promise<void>;
```

Promise&lt;void&gt;
